body: If u are saying bad words to a staff member or a member on skype can u get punished?
body_tagged: If u are saying bad words to a staff member or a member on skype can u get punished?
title: About talking to members/staff on skype.

replies.body: No, he can block you btw
replies.body_tagged: No, he can block you btw

reply_to.body: No, he can block you btw
reply_to.body_tagged: No, he can block you btw

replies.body: i think when it is like you really mean it in a very bad way, it is punishable but if it is like you just accidentally say it when you're joking, you cursed yourself or talking about something like "oh f**k this", i don't think it is punishable but it depends.
replies.body_tagged: i think when it is like you really mean it in a very bad way, it is punishable but if it is like you just accidentally say it when you're joking, you cursed yourself or talking about something like "oh f**k this", i don't think it is punishable but it depends.

replies.body: yea I dont think so cause its not "avicus related"
replies.body_tagged: yea I dont think so cause its not "avicus related"

replies.body:
No.
I'd recommend strongly against doing it though. Nothing good will come from it :P
replies.body_tagged:
No.
I'd recommend strongly against doing it though. Nothing good will come from it :P

replies.body: Not really the smartest thing to do.
replies.body_tagged: Not really the smartest thing to do.

replies.body: You can't get punished on Avicus for it, but you certainly won't make any friends.
replies.body_tagged: You can't get punished on Avicus for it, but you certainly won't make any friends.

replies.body: No, if people are swearing at us or being rude we cannot punish them on the server however we can block them.
replies.body_tagged: No, if people are swearing at us or being rude we cannot punish them on the server however we can block them.

replies.body: If its a staff member and the chat comes back to a senior staff member they could get in trouble. If its a player, no they can not. Skype is not an avicus service.
replies.body_tagged: If its a staff member and the chat comes back to a senior staff member they could get in trouble. If its a player, no they can not. Skype is not an avicus service.

replies.body: Did I not get in trouble for that because of an event like this?
replies.body_tagged: Did I not get in trouble for that because of an event like this?

reply_to.body: If its a staff member and the chat comes back to a senior staff member they could get in trouble. If its a player, no they can not. Skype is not an avicus service.
